A source told the Daily Mirror newspaper: Dermot O'Leary is still in with a great chance of getting the biggest job of his life, but he's in the dark at the moment.`` He has made the shortlist but there is some pretty stiff competition from a host of big names in America. A decision has not been made yet so Dermot O'Leary has to wait, like any other fan of the show. Other names rumoured to be in the line for the job include former` Saved By The Bell' star Mario Lopez ,` High School Musical' actor Zac Efron and` E!' host Jason Kennedy . Simon Cowell

CRM 2011. Both on-premises and cloud-based versions of the platform will be available in 40 markets and 41 languages starting on 28 February. A 17 January statement by Microsoft chief executive Steve Ballmer emphasised Dynamics CRM's familiar user experience, enabling greater collaboration, streamlining of processes and access to real-time data . Microsoft finds itself locked in a fierce battle for CRM market share title="salesforce-floats-database-com-cloud-for-enterprises-15240" href="http://www.eweekeurope.co.uk/news/salesforce-floats-database-com-cloud-for-enterprises-15240"> with Salesforce.com and Oracle, both of which have shown little hesitation in both updating their products and sniping at their rivals.

W?re Saddam Hussein noch an der Macht, w?re die Region viel gef?hrlicher, als sie heute ist , schreibt er. have been raped in the last week in western Ivory Coast, where 16,000 people have taken refuge since the disputed Nov. 28 presidential runoff vote. Another 29,000 people have fled across the border to Liberia. We regret that as a result of the ethnic clashes that we witnessed in Duekue in particular recently, a number of rape cases have come to our attention, Simon Munzu said. In the almost two months since the presidential election, incumbent leader Laurent Gbagbo has refused to cede power even though the international community says his rival Alassane Ouattara won the vote. All three members of the delegation joined Gov. Peter Shumlin at a Statehouse news conference one week ago and pledged to help the state secure federal waivers needed to implement sweeping health care reforms. Bernie Sanders said, It is my strong hope that Vermont will lead the nation in a new direction through a Medicare-for-all single-payer approach. At a time when 50 million Americans lack health insurance and when the cost of health care continues to soar, we must do all we can to lower the costs and improve the quality of care. Patrick Leahy said,`` This is a bill to give Vermont and other states the choice to go above and beyond the national standard by letting states devise their own reforms.
